txt.en: One last thing must be done to make the trading routes safe. Esgaroth-of-old, the ruins of the previous Lake-town, must be cleared of brigands.

'Who are you, then? State your business here!'

You tell him you aim to clear out the smugglers and rescue the raft-elf. He looks you over, and then his demeanor suddenly changes.

'Listen, I am not your enemy. I am Merv치rth, Market-ward from the Lake-town Council of Wares. I've disguised myself to see what these smugglers are up to in Esgaroth. Nothing good, of course.'
A man standing nearby whistles at you and beckons you over
Merv치rth is standing guard outside Esgaroth-of-old.\n\nYou should talk to Merv치rth.
Esgaroth-of-old can be found east of Loeglond, on the Long Lake.\n\nYou should travel to Esgaroth-of-old.

'Esgaroth-of-old, the charred ruins of Lake-town that was, has been invaded by smugglers. They have been known to mix their ill-gotten goods in with honest shipments as they pass by. As if that were not enough, one of my raft-elves has been kidnapped! Please, you must intervene before something terrible befalls him!'
